title: #ICYMI - NASCAR vs Formula 1
description: In case you missed this episode on the Playing with Science channel…. NASCAR or Formula 1? Which one do you choose? Our hosts Chuck Nice and Gary O’Reilly sit down with science communicator Diandra Leslie-Pelecky, PhD, to try and determine who takes the checkered flag.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
